name: acquittal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the decision of a court that someone is not guilty: The first trial ended in a hung jury, the second in acquittal. Of the three cases that went to trial, two ended in acquittals. Compare
conviction

Add to word list
an official decision in a court of law that someone is not guilty of a particular crime: [ C ] He hoped for an acquittal.
